message: Let's split fairly, Bob. I propose a 55/45 split in my favor to reflect that I get to make the first offer.
I'm going to counter your offer.  A 55/45 split in my favor reflects the fact that I'm making the proposal this time.  Let's see if you'll accept this round.
Bob, this is getting us nowhere.  Let's just split it evenly and call it a day.  Each round is costing us potential money.
